modName: Mrissi - A tail of troubles RUSSIAN ver
summary:
Meet a strange looking girl, discover her story, then face the consequences.
Complex companion mod, fully voiced, featuring mysterious girl with unique appearance and personality, and her grim past, involving Thalmor-Elsweyr relations.
RUSSIAN version.
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow]This is the RUSSIAN version! Full english translation is [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34794]HERE[/url]![/color]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/N2QHDe0.png[/img]
[right][code]by Q[/code][/right]
[color=red][u]{Description}[/u][/color]

It's a lore-friendly story of a strange girl, she has an unusual look and a scattered memories about her past.

Player can search for clues, reveal her past and make a decision - help her remember or let her past be forgotten.

First quest starts in Bannered mare, Whiterun. Just walk in and hear some talks.


At first I was planning to do a catgirl comedy, but the story happens to became more serious, lorefriendly and sometimes sad. There are still
some cat jokes, though.

She has a personality (curious and a little selfish, as a cat. She was born as a khajiit after all. But she has a little more catlike behavior
than a usual khajiit) and will comment world interactions.

She is essential, will not become hostile forever even after several friendly fire accidents, and will not set off the traps. Also she has a
unique mount to ride.
Her skills are (or more likely will be, after the quests) light armor and archery. And a bit of onehanded.


Mod is marked adult-only for some dark story moments and for her textures.
(You will be able to change her clothes after earning her trust. NOTE: she will not be happy about going around naked)


[line]
[color=yellow][u]{Translations}[/u][/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34794]English version[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41211]German version[/url]

[line]
[color=yellow][u]{Features}[/u][/color]

[list]
[*] Unique follower with her own dialogues and quests (and yes, you can loose and get a bad ending).
[*] She is using UNP slim body with custom textures.
[*] Full voicing.
[*] About 6-15 hours of gameplay, depending on your game progress.
[*] World commentaries about places and game events, including ones from dragonborn and dawnguard.
[*] Custom follower system, will not clash with vanilla and other companions and quests.
[*] Unique tiger mount, she will ride when you are. Will be available after a specific quest.
[*] Spell to teleport her to player anytime (she will give it to you after certain moment)
[*] Improved follower functionality:
[/list]
[list]
[*]-does not affect follower count
[*]-after a few stages you'll be able to propose her a new places as home (if she likes it)
[*]-or give her any clothes and say what to wear (will not unequip those armors by herself, even if got better ones, unless told to)
[*]-or to teach her some combat perks from common books, while you read them with her (additional quest after the main story)
[*]-she will behave like Serana from dawnguard, moving around if player is standing still for some time
[*]-she will nag about hunger. You can feed her once in a while, in an additional dialogue. But keep your moonsugar away! (if you don't want her to ask - just give her some fish or sweets directly into her inventory)
[*]-you can shut her up if you're tired of the commentaries. You may find out how to, while doing the main quest
[*]-she is essential, won't set off traps and will not kill you in case of friendly fire
[/list]

If you managed to lost her somehow before you get the teleport spell, you can use console command
startquest MrissiComeBack

If you don't want to play, and wish to just get a follower
startquest MrissiSkip
(before you start her story)

Plans for the future:
~More commens overall
~More dialogue branches
~Marriage quest and hearthfire support

[line]
[color=yellow][u]{Requirements}[/u][/color]

Official dlc:
[list]
[*] Dawnguard
[*] Dragonborn
[/list]

[line]
[color=yellow][u]{Recommendations}[/u][/color]

For better experience I recommend to use:
[list]
[*] for more [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303]realistic female emotions[/url]
[*] for more [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45919]less ridiculous sabrecat idle animation[/url]
[/list]

[line]
[color=yellow][u]{Optional files}[/u][/color]

You can adjust her with optional files:
~2 different face variants.
~less furry texture
~underwear
~cbbe slim body (changes her body, not compatible with less furry texture or underwear)

[line]
[color=yellow][u]{Compatibilities}[/u][/color]

It should be compatible with any mod that doesn't heavily modify used locations.

Report any problems, please.

[u]Confirmed incompatibility (clipping areas)[/u]:
~Swift Steeds Stables by Fierymarigold
~Dead Manor by Edga
~Urosh Yal Stronghold by screamingabdab

[line]
[color=yellow][u]{Change Log}[/u][/color]


1.3.1 {20.12.14}
- added a few comments about player-vampire lord
- added few improvements into scripts, quests should go more smooth
- fixed issue when she doesn't sandbox while waiting
- fixed rare issue when the quest Total recall didn't complete
- cleaned with TES5Edit
- added a command to teleport her to player if she's lost and you don't have teleport spell yet
- added a command to skip all the story and just instantly get a follower

1.3.0 {01.12.14}
- added a whole new quest, get her a mount (she'll tell you something, or just check for new dialogue option)
- unique mount for her, with custom system, should not interfere with other mount mods (she will ride when you are)
- 120 new place related commentaries
- added a few dialogue branches in the previous quests (for those who don't like play jokes on her)
- fixed voice loudness, should be better now
- Fixed all (I believe) grammar mistakes, thanks to thegeekywolfie
- checked for script log errors

1.2.2 {20-02-14}
- fixed invalid master file order
- added a short FAQ into mod archive

1.2.1 {18-02-14}
- added comments, regarding DLC content
- more battle cries and sounds
- more random comments overall
- 2 face variants in optional files
- optional less furry texture
- ECE face support (you can make her a new face using http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951 There is a tutorial for it, don't ask me. If you

still won't know how - then you don't need it.)
- fixed some grammar and spelling mistakes (big thanks to Brieman)
- teleport spell now works even when she is dismissed
- removed some texture seams
- she can't use 2 swords now (she's not so strong, so I fixed it)
- feeding system reworked (it's fully working now, with a variability of food she likes, and with a reaction for moonsugar)
- made a bad ending more obvious, to help some optimists realise the truth

1.2.0 {06-10-13}
- Full voicing added.
- New collar model added. (now more detailed and with a ground model)
- Potentially fixed issues with scripts stucking.
- Changed time between her commentaries - now longer.
- Nerf to her abilities after education through books.
(she was overpowered after this quest in earlier versions)
- Fixed some grammar mistakes. (thanks to MysticalNinja32)

1.1.3 {09-05-13}
- Fixed issue with Requiem mod (when lowlevel player can't persuade jeweller to talk)

1.1.2 {04-05-13}
- Used vanilla nps's replaced with custom ones.
- Remaked a few scripts:
- Fixed rare issue, when the first quest don't starts.
- Fixed rare scene stucking issue.
- Added failsafe mechanics to avoid quest freezing.
(now if the game can't play some scene - it would just skip the problem stage)
- Text cleanup.

1.1.1 {20-04-13}
- Fixed gibberish Bannered Mare name.
- Fixed issue with first dialogue with talmor fails quest, disregard the topic choice, if you skip his text.
- Cleaned with TES5Edit and by hand.

1.1 {14-04-13}
- Full english translation.
- Added active idling. While player is standing still, M'rissi will start to wondering around.
- Added a method to shut her up, disabling her comments. You may find it out, while doing the main quest.
- Added occasional nagging about hunger. You can feed her once in a while, in an additional dialogue. (but, she won't ask for it

if you give her some fish or sweets directly into her inventory)
- Added visual effects to her teleport spell.
- More world comments.
- Added a few illustrations.

1.0 {14-03-13}
- Initial release.

[line]
[color=green][u]{Installation}[/u][/color]

extract the files into:
...Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data

-Open the Skyrim launcher
-Click on data files
-Check the box for "Mrissi.esp"

OR

-Download with Nexus Mod Manager
-In NMM window, find "Mrissi.esp", highlight it, and click on "Activate mod" at left

[line]
[u]{Credits and thanks}[/u]

The english translation is done by KunKunTheDetective, who didn't simply translate, but improved the texts greatly.
The mount quest is translated by tem1980 and logsdonkenneth.
German translation is released, thanks to Merkur67.

Voices:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1401042]Sininensusi[/url] (it would be not possible without her, she's awesome)

[url=http://finalcrystine.blogspot.ru/2012/02/voice-acting-resume.html]FinalCrystine[/url]
- Isael
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/3627833-darkrogue21]Darkrogue21[/url]
- Colette's apprentice
PapaTango104
- Ghost
[url=http://www.matthewwade.co.uk]Lomekian[/url]

- Mercenary
- Imperial commander
- Khajiit commander
- Kjens the hunter
[url=http://www.themarkenticknap.com/]Mentic[/url]
- Sot
- Thief-Jeweller
- Creep
- Trader
Wolf999
- Justiciar

Permissions:
- Female head meshes, *.tri and eye texture belongs to Nuska, from her [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20627]Dagi-Raht Khajiit race[/url]
- Female body meshes belongs to dimon99, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP[/url] female body
- Optional body mesh - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CBBE[/url] by Caliente
- Collar model belongs to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29886]Layam[/url]
- Tiger models belongs to '[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12647]Prides of Skyrim[/url]' creators: Targaryen, tumbajamba,

TreasureChest, DVAted, Frank the Fish

Thanks to tem1980 for proposing so many new world comments!

Thanks to thegeekywolfie, Brieman, FarSolar for fixing language mistakes!

Also thank to my friend Nec for a help with a screenwriting.


Sorry if there are any mistakes in this readme, english is not my native.
author: Q
